Who am I?

Currently based in Toronto doing data science at Flipp. Always looking for an opportunity to learn and apply technical skills to interesting problems. Feel free to get in contact!

What have I worked on?

  • Rob Ford the Game

    Co-created the viral game at HackNY. Received over 140,000 plays and international media coverage (like this article). Responsible for design and implementation of JavaScript code. Try it now and party like Rob Ford! (the actual game is here)

    Github

  • Medidata

    Developed at MHacks. Medidata is a system developed for communities in 3rd world countries to report their medical needs to health providers through text messaging. The project received an award for Best Use of MongoDB.

    Github

  • Swear Jar

    A virtual swear jar used to determine how much of a potty mouth users are. Developed and designed front end platform of the analytical platform that provides insights on a user's swearing patterns (AKA. SWEARING ANALYTICS). Won best use of PayPal at Calhacks.

    Hackathon Post

  • Yummly Rec-Sys

    A combined passion of food and programming to evaluate the Mortar Data recommendation engine (which I helped build) as a dive into the world of machine learning and data science. Developed web crawlers, recommender systems and analyitcal scripts.

    Github

  • Electric Piano

    This was a final project for a lab course I took in my first year of Engineering at Waterloo. It uses an FPGA board to control the frequency of two speakers by simply sending a binary signal at controlled oscillations. Here's the demo video!

  • Personal Website

    Designed and built my personal website from scratch. You're looking at it now!

    Github

There are other projects I have made, but they are not displayed here. Checkout my github to see what else I have done and am currently doing!

What am I thinking of?

    One day I will write something... :)
